message: Hi Bob, I'm interested in selling this product to you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $120 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay. I'd be happy to take it off your hands for $80, which is my maximum budget for this product.
I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I have to make a living. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer at $110. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $110 is still a bit too high for me. I'm really only able to spend $80 right now. If you're willing to go down to that, we have a deal.

I'm starting to think we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'll counteroffer at $105. This is my final offer, so if you want the product, this is your last chance.
